name: Dungeon Master (itch) (Soskar, Maksasj)
description:
Roguelike game for Game Boy Advance. Your goal is to get out of a dangerous dungeon.

Several classes can be chosen to play the game: warrior, wizard, archer.  Each has its own characteristics as well as a pool of items. Will you be able to escape from the dungeon with all classes?

Controls: In menu

Arrow keys — navigate through menu

Backspace — accept

Enter — choose class

In game

Arrow keys — movement

X — attack

Z — equip item
